page.title: 16*OUT AND ABOUT IN HASWELL*
page.content: The Brigade is on every Thursday in the Church Hall. They have sports and have just recently bought some new equipment. The school has an activity night when parents help. We do art, games, badminton, computer, needlework and recorder lessons.Grown-ups in Haswell can play bowls and bingo, have a drink or go to the restaurant for a meal. The library is a blue van.It comes twice a month.It has some good books. On Monday you can go to Guides. You can make lots of friends. They are knitting blankets for Ethiopia. There are 20 members of Haswell Mother's Union. If there is a fayre they bake cakes and give prizes. There is also a W.I. branch. People come to speak to them about interesting event
